#labels Phase-Implementation
#summary OSMan module.

= Summary =

OSMan *module* is Win32 dll containing OLE-Automation objects.

= Details =

OSMan module file extention must be *omm* (OsManModule). Module must export OSManModule function.
Module load order is undefined, so module implementation should not rely or depend on loading order.

If any error occured during module loading or OSManModule function call then no module and objects registered in OSMan.
